headline: The Vassal Team is happy to announce the release of Vassal {{version}}.
important: There is now a single universal app bundle for MacOS. It runs natively on both 64-bit x86 (Intel) and 64-bit ARM (Apple Silicon) Macs.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of Vassal. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

new_features.desc: Add pieceCount to the map auto reporter

Improved "Refresh Predefined Setups": Expanded "orphan counter" functionality - reporting / ability to repair (sub-option); ability to do additional processing via a special post-refresh Global Hotkey, optionallywi ithout routine refresh reporting; new filter field and associated functionality for Predefined Setup Refresh; other UI improvements

bug_fixes.desc: Current Location Fast Match was not recognizing pieces in same location but not same X, Y position
CountMap() by Property gives Bad Data error
Fix 'Apply on Move' description in Deck Send Key Command
Show Piece Property menu on Expression Builder trait fields
Sleep function now sleeps correct number of milliseconds instead of 2000
Attachments are lost after Undo
Cargo now correctly follows Mat after Moved Fixed Distance
Remove Unused Images does not find any images in use in an Extension
Compute correct _Degrees property for free rotations
Show correct sides in Wizard after using Prev button
Prevent Wizard crashing when using Prev/Next when no Password exist

other_improvements.desc: Added Return to Deck to trait list in Reference Manual

bug_fixes.desc: Prevent room non-owners starting new games
Allow wizard to load setups from extensions
Spelling correction on Global Options panel
Fix poor performance of Piece Definer; remove spurious blank line from Mass Piece Loader
Fixed IndexOutOfBoundsException in empty chat room
Refresh visible portions of Maps after each UI, log, or network action
Prevent zero length string error on Deck refresh
Prevent crash if I/O Exception during CRC calculation
Cancelling Return To Deck no longer causes crash

other_improvements.desc: Make Zoom component a default component of all maps
Do not record Map Id's in saved Deck files so they will load on any Map
Search: Add option to exclude module elements when editing extension
"Player joins as side" message now broadcast to all players

bug_fixes.desc: Store correct value in prefs for Module Manager column widths
Labels have incorrect bounds when using italics
Prevent Welcome Wizard from loading multiple pre-defined setups concurrently
Deck Key Commands do not work on subsequent new games
Suppress unhelpful bad data error reports from the Piece Palette
Prevent integer overflow when computing the size of image pixel data in bytes

other_improvements.desc: Editor search revamp: more options and enhanced navigation
